snippet.title: Deathloop - Gameplay Trailer #3 - déjà vu | PS5
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/deathloop?emcid=or-1s-412983

24 hours. 8 Targets. 1 Rival Assassin. 
Trapped in a time loop, Colt has been experiencing déjà vu for as long as he can remember, which actually isn’t very long because he has amnesia and only really remembers his recent past. That might explain all the déjà vu, honestly. Every time the day loops it’s a struggle to remember everything so he can use the knowledge he has to push himself forward and, hopefully, off the island of Blackreef. Colt sets his sights on a new target – the Visionary, “Ramblin’” Frank Spicer – in the latest DEATHLOOP trailer. 

Rated Mature
